data.name: Unsafe
data.detailed_description:
Update Notes

We are working on a mega update for "Black Monolith" while we are working on the second map. Stay tuned for more!


About the Game



Unsafe is a co-op horror survival game for up to 4 players. You and your team members wake up from your cryostasis in the “Black Monolith” station. Although you were the ones who set up the station equipment and devices, you don’t know what happened next. Your untimely awakening means one thing: everything went wrong. Investigate the area to learn more about what transpired while you were in stasis. Bypass security systems, gather data, face dangers. Stay together. Stay sane. Stay alive.




Trello Roadmap: https://trello.com/b/OWFznUkd/unsafe-roadmap

  • Multiplayer: Form a group of up to 4 players and explore the desolated space station. Work together to bypass computer security, run away from danger or revive fallen comrades.

  • Tools: Use tools to keep yourself and your teammates safe!

  • Proximity Comms: Use your microphone to communicate with your teammates. Stray far from your team and silence will be your new friend.

  • Gameplay: A horror experience in space. An Alien (film) like mood, where the players are powerless against the terrors of the void, but not hopeless.

  • Map: Explore the two-story section of the abandoned space station. Every turn seems familiar, but is that to your advantage?

  • Environment: Realistic graphics and sounds set a claustrophobic mood. The minimal UI adds to the feeling of being left alone in space.

data.short_description: UNSAFE is a horror co-op sci-fi game.Go Solo, or Cooperate with a team of up to 4 players to survive a space station that has succumbed to Horrors of its own making. Uncover the secrets of UNSAFE in this unique thriller experience.Be warned, this is not a shooter, nor is it for the feint of heart...
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Dual core or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3 4th Gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
